"<div class=""hanzi"">A:雨太大了，明天再去买吧。<br />B:好吧，但是明天一定要买到。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">A:雨太大了，明天再去买吧。<br />B:好吧，但是明天一定要买到。</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin"">Yǔ tài dà le, míngtiān zài qù mǎi ba.<br />Hǎo  ba, dànshì míngtiān yídìng yào mǎidào.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>         It's raining heavily. Let's go buy it tomorrow.<br />Fine, but tomorrow we definitely have to buy it.         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes""></div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">Statement + 吧</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGJIP2E>Conceding with ""ba""</a> </div>"
"<div class=""hanzi"">A:可以带朋友吗？<br />B:行吧，但是不能带女孩。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">A:可以带朋友吗？<br />B:行吧，但是不能带女孩。</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin"">Kěyǐ dài péngyou ma ?<br />Xíng  ba, dànshì bù néng dài nǚhái.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>         Can I bring friends?<br />All right, but you can't bring girls.         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes""></div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">Statement + 吧</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGJIP2E>Conceding with ""ba""</a> </div>"

"<div class=""hanzi"">我受够了！我一定要跟他离婚！</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">我受够了！我一定要跟他离婚！</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin"">Wǒ shòu gòu le! I'm definitely going to divorce him.         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes""></div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">Subj. + Verb + 够 (+ 了)</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASG49BE6>Expressing ""enough"" with ""gou""</a> </div>"

"<div class=""header"">Is this sentence grammatically correct?</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""hanzi"">我恐怕今天没有时间做作业。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">我恐怕今天没有时间做作业。</div>  <div class=""english"">         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""pinyin"">Wǒ  kǒngpà jīntiān méiyóǔ shíjiān zuò zuòyè.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>                  <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""incorrect"">Not correct!</div>         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes"">Never put 我 before 恐怕!</div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">(Reason,) 恐怕 + Fact / Conclusion</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGD4BA3>Expressing concern with ""kongpa""</a> </div>"

"<div class=""hanzi"">这两家店的东西价格差很多。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">这两家店的东西价格差很多。</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin"">Zhè liǎng jiā diàn de dōngxi jiàgé chà hěn duō.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>         There is a big difference in price between these two shops.         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes""></div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">A + 跟 / 和 +  B + 差很多</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGQAN74>The opposite of ""cha hen duo"" is ""chabuduo""</a> </div>"

"<div class=""header"">Is this sentence grammatically correct?</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""hanzi"">我在带护照。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">我在带护照。</div>  <div class=""english"">         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""pinyin"">Wǒ zài dài hùzhào.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>                  <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""incorrect"">Not correct!</div>         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes"">Having your passport (on you) is not an action, so don't use 在.)</div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">Verb + 着</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGOIDEO>Aspect particle ""zhe""</a> </div>"
"<div class=""header"">Is this sentence grammatically correct?</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""hanzi"">她坐着吗？</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">她坐着吗？</div>  <div class=""english"">         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""pinyin"">Tā zuò zhe ma?</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>                  <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""correct"">Correct!</div>         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes"">Be sitting is a state, so using 着 is natural.)</div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">Verb + 着</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGOIDEO>Aspect particle ""zhe""</a> </div>"
"<div class=""header"">Is this sentence grammatically correct?</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""hanzi"">她在坐吗？</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">她在坐吗？</div>  <div class=""english"">         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""pinyin"">Tā zài zuò ma?</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>                  <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""incorrect"">Not correct!</div>         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes"">Be sitting is not an action (plus ""在坐"" is likely to be mistaken for the action ""在做""), so don't use 在.)</div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">Verb + 着</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGOIDEO>Aspect particle ""zhe""</a> </div>"
"<div class=""header"">Is this sentence grammatically correct?</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""hanzi"">躺着最舒服。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">躺着最舒服。</div>  <div class=""english"">         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""pinyin"">Tǎng zhe zuì shūfu.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>                  <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""correct"">Correct!</div>         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes"">Lying here is a state, so using 着 is natural.)</div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">Verb + 着</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGOIDEO>Aspect particle ""zhe""</a> </div>"
"<div class=""header"">Is this sentence grammatically correct?</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""hanzi"">在躺最舒服。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">在躺最舒服。</div>  <div class=""english"">         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""pinyin"">Zài tǎng zuì shūfu .</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>                  <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""incorrect"">Not correct!</div>         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes"">Lying here is not strictly an action, so don't use 在.)</div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">Verb + 着</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGOIDEO>Aspect particle ""zhe""</a> </div>"

"<div class=""hanzi"">去上海吧，太远；去北京吧，人太多。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">去上海吧，太远；去北京吧，人太多。</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin"">Qù Shànghǎi ba, tài yuǎn; qù Běijīng ba, rén tài duō.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>         Going to Shanghai is too far away, going to Beijing has too many people.         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes""></div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">[Option 1] + 吧，[Evaluation]； [Option 2] + 吧， [Evaluation]</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGELOTT>Reviewing options with ""ba""</a> </div>"
"<div class=""hanzi"">冬天去吧，太冷；夏天去吧，太热。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">冬天去吧，太冷；夏天去吧，太热。</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin"">Dōngtiān qù ba, tài lěng; xiàtiān qù ba, tài rè.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>         Going in the winter is too cold, going in the summer is too hot.         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes""></div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">[Option 1] + 吧，[Evaluation]； [Option 2] + 吧， [Evaluation]</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGELOTT>Reviewing options with ""ba""</a> </div>"

"<div class=""header"">Is this sentence grammatically correct?</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""hanzi"">我想跟你见面。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">我想跟你见面。</div>  <div class=""english"">         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""pinyin"">Wǒ xiǎng gēn nǐ jiànmiàn.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>                  <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""correct"">Correct!</div>         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes"">the prepositional phrase, literally ""with you,"" comes before the verb</div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi""></span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASG4GVRX>Separable verb</a> </div>"
"<div class=""header"">Is this sentence grammatically correct?</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""hanzi"">我想见面你。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">我想见面你。</div>  <div class=""english"">         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""pinyin"">Wǒ xiǎng jiànmiàn nǐ.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>                  <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""incorrect"">Not correct!</div>         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes"">你 is an extra object; 面 is already the object</div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi""></span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASG4GVRX>Separable verb</a> </div>"
"<div class=""header"">Is this sentence grammatically correct?</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""hanzi"">我想跟她结婚。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">我想跟她结婚。</div>  <div class=""english"">         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""pinyin"">Wǒ xiǎng gēn tā jiéhūn.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>                  <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""correct"">Correct!</div>         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes"">the prepositional phrase, literally ""with her,"" comes before the verb</div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi""></span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASG4GVRX>Separable verb</a> </div>"

"<div class=""header"">Is this sentence grammatically correct?</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""hanzi"">我不要分手跟你。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">我不要分手跟你。</div>  <div class=""english"">         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""pinyin"">Wǒ bùyào fēnshǒu gēn nǐ.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>                  <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""incorrect"">Not correct!</div>         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes"">the prepositional phrase needs to come before the verb</div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi""></span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASG4GVRX>Separable verb</a> </div>"

"<div class=""hanzi"">如果不好好复习，你就无法通过明天的考试。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">如果不好好复习，你就无法通过明天的考试。</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin"">Rúguǒ bù hǎohǎo fùxí, nǐ jiù wúfǎ tōngguò míngtiān de kǎoshì.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>         If you don't review well, you won't be able to pass tomorrow's test.         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes""></div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">如果 + Statement + 就 + Result</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGGIVT0>Expressing ""if…, then…"" with ""ruguo…, jiu…""</a> </div>"

"<div class=""hanzi"">他一方面很想创业，另一方面又担心风险太大。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">他一方面很想创业，另一方面又担心风险太大。</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin"">Tā yī fāngmiàn hěn xiǎng chuàngyè, lìng yī fāngmiàn yòu dānxīn fēngxiǎn tài dà.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>         On one hand, he wants to start a business, but on the other hand, he's afraid the risk is too great.         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes""></div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">一 方面 + Aspect 1， (另) 一 方面 + Aspect 2</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGCWHNF>Expressing various aspects with ""yi fangmian""</a> </div>"
"<div class=""hanzi"">智能手机一方面让我们的生活方便了很多，另一方面也浪费了我们不少时间。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">智能手机一方面让我们的生活方便了很多，另一方面也浪费了我们不少时间。</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin"">Zhìnéng shǒujī yī fāngmiàn ràng wǒmen de shēnghuó fāngbiàn le hěn duō, lìng yī fāngmiàn yě làngfèi le wǒmen bùshǎo shíjiān.</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>         One one hand, smart phone makes our life more convenient; on the other hand, it wastes a lot of our time.         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes""></div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">一 方面 + Aspect 1， (另) 一 方面 + Aspect 2</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGCWHNF>Expressing various aspects with ""yi fangmian""</a> </div>"

"<div class=""hanzi"">是谁告诉你的？</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">是谁告诉你的？</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin"">Shì shéi gàosu nǐ de?</div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>         Who was it that told you?         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes"">Emphasizing ""who""</div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi"">Subj. + 是 + Information to be Emphasized + Verb + 的</span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASG8YTSF>Using the ""shi... de"" construction</a> </div>"

"<div class=""hanzi"">你知道妈妈一向不爱出门，所以她是不会跟我们去旅行的。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">你知道妈妈一向不爱出门，所以她是不会跟我们去旅行的。</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin""></div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>         You know mom has never liked going out, so she is not going on the trip with us.         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes""></div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi""></span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGVEP8S>Comparing ""yizhi"" and ""yixiang""</a> </div>"
"<div class=""hanzi"">她这个人一向喜欢炫耀，很讨厌。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">她这个人一向喜欢炫耀，很讨厌。</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin""></div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>         She has always liked showing off, she's horrible.         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes""></div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi""></span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGVEP8S>Comparing ""yizhi"" and ""yixiang""</a> </div>"
"<div class=""hanzi"">我这个朋友一向都很大方，今天肯定是他请客。</div>"	"<div class=""hanzi"">我这个朋友一向都很大方，今天肯定是他请客。</div> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div class=""english"">         <div class=""pinyin""></div>         <div class=""spacerSmall""> </div>         This friend of mine is always very generous,so today he's definitely paying.         <div class=""spacerMedium""> </div>         <div class=""notes""></div> </div>   <div class=""lessonInfo""> <div class=""spacer""> </div> <div>Pattern: <span class=""lessonInfoHanzi""></span></div> Article: <a href=https://resources.allsetlearning.com/chinese/grammar/ASGVEP8S>Comparing ""yizhi"" and ""yixiang""</a> </div>"
